name: LogicSource, Inc.
overview:
Successful sourcing is an equation with many variables. It demands a balance of sharp expertise, collaborative suppliers and robust technology. We are the sourcing solutions firm that leverages these variables to increase our clients’ sourcing strength and ensure maximum value.

LogicSource delivers results for our clients through three product and service offerings, which are tailored to their specific needs. We: 1.Empower businesses to operate more effectively with our OneMarket® software suite; 2.Influence better strategic sourcing and procurement through on-demand Advisory services; and we 3.Assure maximum effectiveness through co-sourcing partnerships. Co-sourcing is a collaborative approach to assuring that our clients receive the maximum cost reductions, efficiencies and innovation opportunities. Co-sourcing combines the smart application of lean business processes, user-friendly technology, and the ideal combination of the client’s existing staff plus dedicated and “virtual” resources from LogicSource.

Our culture is a unique blend of collaborative and entrepreneurial. We constantly enter new, challenging spend categories in service of our customers and we have developed a commercial model that effectively aligns our clients’ interests with our own. Our working environment supports our continued success by encouraging inspiration, strong teamwork, proactive knowledge sharing, and a pioneering spirit. LogicSource is headquartered in Norwalk, CT.
